Description:
A general detection for processes creating PFX files. This could be an indicator of an adversary exporting a local certificate to a PFX file.

Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious PFX File Creation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like '%.pfx' and  not (filepath like '%\templates\windows\windows_temporarykey.pfx%' and filepath like '%\cmake\%'))
